official-title.#text:
To direct the Administrator of the Federal Emergency
		  Management Agency to designate New Jersey Task Force 1 as part of the National
		  Urban Search and Rescue System.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

header.#text:
Addition of team to national
			 urban search and rescue system

text.#text:
The terrorist
			 attacks of September 11, 2001, demonstrated the importance of enhancing
			 national domestic terrorism preparedness.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
were called into
			 action in the wake of the events of September 11th.

National Urban Search and
			 Rescue System of the Federal Emergency Management Agency

text.#text:
Twenty-six of the
			 28 urban search and rescue teams included in the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: were the first teams in New York City on September 11th.

text.#text:
Highly qualified,
			 urban search and rescue teams not included in the

The continuing
			 threat of a possible domestic terrorist attack remains an important mission for
			 which the Nation must prepare to respond.
